sentences.en: Customers know that our sales offer genuine markdowns across the shop.
sentences.cn: 顾客们知道我们的大甩卖是货真价实的全场降价。

sentences.en: On the calendar below, markdown 2 - 3 important things that you need to do this month.
sentences.cn: 请在旁边的日历记下 2-3 件你在本月要做的重要事情.

trans.tran_en: a reduction in the price of something
